spl.assets

Class Asset

  • java.lang.Object
    • spl.assets.Asset

  • public class Asset
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a real estate asset which is rented for customer groups. "This object will hold information of a single asset."
    Author:
    Elad & Gal

      • checkIfDamaged

        public boolean checkIfDamaged()
        Check if the asset is damaged. if all asset contents health is below 65% it is damaged.
        Returns:
        true, if damaged
